casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Jaheed HYMON, Petitioner No. 47 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. May 17, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 17th day of May, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and the case is REMANDED to the Court of Common Pleas for imposition of an order consistent with this Court's opinion in Commonwealth v. Perfetto, 7 EAP 2018.
